overview.en: Mallcoin (MLC) is a cryptocurrency and operates on the Ethereum platform. Mallcoin has a current supply of 231,228,611.40253773 with 176,136,853.48640126 in circulation. The last known price of Mallcoin is 0.0156304 USD and is down -1.58 over the last 24 hours. More information can be found at https://flogmall.com.
